import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useParams, useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, Form, FormGroup, FormLabel } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/checkoutSteps' function PlaceOrderScreen() { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const dispatch = useDispatch() const navigate = useNavigate() return (

Shipping

Shipping to: {cart.shippingAddress}

) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
